{{Wired embedded system |brand=Buffalo |model=LinkStation |revision=(HLANIDT-CA) |asin=B0000ZPPB4 |price=349 |est_release_date=04/2004 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |type=NAS |pwr_v=120-240 |pwr_amp=0.6 |pwr_conn=AC (Figure-Eight) |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=IDT |cpu1_model=79RC32H434 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320ATTC-90 |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5DU121622BT-D43 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, IDE |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL |eth_chip1_brand=Realtek |eth_chip1_model=RTL8201CP |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=4-wire Serial Real Time Clock;Ricoh;RS5C348A;;1;,,, 8-bit Microcontroller;Freescale Semiconductor;MC68HC908;;1;,,, PCI USB 2.0 Controller;NEC;μPD720101GJ;D720101GJ, 0511PPA1C;1;,,, PCI IDE Disk Controller;ITE;IT8211;ITE, IT8211AF, 0514-DXS, ZMKHKN;1;,,, Switching P-Channel Power MOSFET;NEC;μPA1717;;2;,,, 3.3V Zero Delay Buffer;Cypress;CY2305;;1; |stock_os=Linux;2.4.17; |tp_firmware=OpenLink, FreeLink |default_ip=192.168.11.150 |default_user=root |oui_eth=00:0D:0B }} *[https://web.archive.org/web/20151120233722/http://buffalo.nas-central.org/wiki/Main_Page NAS Central Page] (archive)
